gwt.g2d.client.framework
Class AbstractApp

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.framework.AbstractApp
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public abstract class AbstractApp
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class for running and rendering an application. This class is deprecated and will be removed in future release. Please consider using FpsTimer instead.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Method Detail

getPrimarySurface

public final Surface getPrimarySurface()
Deprecated. 
Gets the primary surface for the application.

isPaused

public boolean isPaused()
Deprecated. 
Gets whether the application is paused.

setPaused

public void setPaused(boolean paused)
Deprecated. 
Sets whether the application is paused. Pausing the application will not take place immediately; instead, it will be paused before the next update loop.

exit

public void exit()
Deprecated. 
Exits the application.

run

public void run(int fps)
Deprecated. 
Runs the application at the desired FPS. The application will try to call update and draw as many times as the given frames per second, but it may be called less often if there is a performance hit in either method.

Parameters:
fps - the number of frames per second to run the application at.

initialize

public abstract void initialize()
Deprecated. 
Performs initialization logics before the application right before the application is run.

update

public abstract void update()
Deprecated. 
Updates the application. Override this method to perform the actions that occurs every fps.
